name: Only one LEVEL
description:
Full screen recommended

  • WASD or arrow keys to move
  • Left click to shoot
  • 'R' to restart level

The timer doesn't run during the title screens so don't worry about that!

Music is from http://teknoaxe.com/Link_Code_3.php?q=1518

I had a bunch of other ideas for levels, but I had to scrap most of them so that completing the game withing 1 minute is reasonably easy (also to adhere to the jam theme). Oh well.  Maybe next time
